metadata.title: CVE-2024-31950 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In FRRouting (FRR) through 9.1, there can be a buffer overflow and daemoncrash in ospf_te_parse_ri for OSPF LSA packets during an attempt to readSegment Routing subTLVs (their size is not validated).

criterions.comment: frr package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
quagga package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
